title: Our solar system: the inner planets
brief_description: One of a two tape set aimed at children that takes a fun and informative voyage to each planet in our solar system. Interesting facts about each planet are presented, such as size, composition, relative position in the solar system, gravity and temperature. A combination of video footage, photographs and animation are used to present an authentic picture of each planet. ‘The inner planets’ visits Earth, its moon, Venus, Mercury and Mars. See also ‘The Outer planets.’
